modName: Spooky Edits - First Person Female Alternate Textures Fix
summary: Adds separate female first person meshes for each alternative texture set to get around a silly skyrim bug.
descriptionHtml:
[color=Lightsteelblue][b]Description :[/b][/color] This is an attempt to make all of the vanilla clothes, robes and armor sets that have alternate textures (but use the same base mesh) show up in the first person view for female characters, since there is nothing quite as immersion breaking as having a complete color miss-match between 3rd and 1st person views.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]My Process : [/b][/color]I made copies of either vanilla skyrim or Unofficial Legendary Patch (where available) 1st person female meshes and gave them unique names, then in nifskope pointed them to the correct textures and in CK I told each armorAddon to use these new files.

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]What this mod doesn't do : [/b][/color]Fix any mod that isn't just a basic texture replacer and has this issue, sorry :(

[color=Lightsteelblue][b]You Missed one ! :[/b][/color] Probably, please let me know in the comments :)



[center][b](: More Spooky Edits :)[/b]
